agroProducts.name: Soy
agroProducts.details: Brazil holds a prominent position in global soy trade, accounting for nearly half of world exports.

agroProducts.name: Corn
agroProducts.description: Brazil's competitiveness and quality for the world
agroProducts.details: Cultivated in two annual harvests, ensuring continuous supply to international markets.
agroProducts.harvest: February to May and June to August

agroProducts.name: Coffee
agroProducts.details: Brazil is the world's largest coffee producer and exporter, responsible for nearly one-third of global production.

agroProducts.name: Beef
agroProducts.description: Global reference in quality and safety
agroProducts.details: Recognized for its quality, tenderness, flavor and food safety standards.

agroProducts.name: Sugar
agroProducts.details: Consolidated leadership in VHP, crystal and refined variants.

agroProducts.name: Cotton
agroProducts.details: Recognized for efficiency in mechanized harvesting and traceability.

agroProducts.name: Chicken
agroProducts.description: World leader in chicken meat exports
agroProducts.details: High-quality Brazilian chicken meat with rigorous sanitary standards and international certifications.

agroProducts.name: Pork
agroProducts.details: Brazilian pork with high quality standards, meeting the requirements of the most demanding markets.

agroProducts.name: Orange Juice
agroProducts.details: Brazil accounts for more than 70% of world concentrated orange juice exports.

agroProducts.name: Fruits
agroProducts.details: Brazilian tropical fruits recognized for quality, flavor and sustainability. Including mango, melon, grapes, papaya and more.

agroProducts.name: Honey
agroProducts.details: Pure and natural Brazilian honey with quality certifications and complete traceability.

agroProducts.name: Wheat
agroProducts.details: Quality Brazilian wheat with expanding production and continuous improvement in standards.

fertilizers.name: Urea
fertilizers.description: High concentration nitrogen fertilizer, ideal for vegetative development and increased productivity.

fertilizers.name: Ammonium Sulfate
fertilizers.description: Balanced source of nitrogen and sulfur, essential for healthy plant growth.

fertilizers.name: Single Superphosphate (SSP)
fertilizers.description: Source of phosphorus and calcium, promoting root strengthening and better nutrient absorption.

fertilizers.name: Triple Superphosphate (TSP)
fertilizers.description: High phosphorus concentration, indicated for soils with low availability of this nutrient.

fertilizers.name: Phosphate Rock
fertilizers.description: Natural raw material for phosphate formulations, ideal for direct use or industrialization.

minerals.name: Iron Ore
minerals.description: Foundation of world steel industry, responsible for a large part of Brazilian exports.

minerals.name: Manganese
minerals.description: Essential for steel production and high-strength metal alloys.

minerals.name: Bauxite
minerals.description: Main source of aluminum, used in various industrial sectors.

minerals.name: Niobium
minerals.description: High technological value mineral, used in the manufacture of special steels and superalloys.

minerals.name: Copper
minerals.description: Widely used in energy, electronics and civil construction.

minerals.name: Gold
minerals.description: Mineral resource of great economic and strategic relevance.

minerals.name: Zinc and Lead
minerals.description: Important for galvanization, batteries and various metal alloys.
